title: Application was unable to Start, what did riot do now?
body: Champion select comes up fine, but when I go into the loading screen I get an error saying "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005). Click Ok to close the application." This error started with 6.6 so I would like to know what the hell Riot did that caused this error to pop up, and what I can do to fix this? I already tried the repair function but obviously it didn't work.

replies.body:
Do you happen to be running AVG Antivirus? The Windows error you're seeing usually occurs when you're missing files or certain Windows or game files have become corrupt, but we've recently been noticing similar issues with AVG. If you are, you can try adding an exception to AVG or temporarily uninstalling it for troubleshooting purposes. 

You can find AVG's guide for adding exceptions [here](https://support.avg.com/SupportArticleView?l=en_US&urlName=How-to-exclude-file-folder-or-website-from-AVG-scanning) and relevant League information for firewalls [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) (may need to scroll down a bit). Lemme know if this helps!
